BodyText: With the new version 1.0.6 release, please enjoy our new Helper Creature system in Battle!!

Name: Creature Weight Changes!
BodyText: We've heard you, Floopers! We are lowering creature weight changes and increasing how much weight you get from ranking up. Now get back to Floopin'!

Name: Sun King's Delicious Cake Festival!
BodyText: Come back everyday for one free Double Layer Cake between 9/12 and 9/26!  You've received today's gift.

Name: BUG: Deputy Hotdog Dungeons
BodyText: We found an issue with Deputy Hotdog where it is not showing up correctly on some devices. This issue will be resolved in our next update and we are giving everyone 25 Gems to make it up. Sorry, dudes!

Name: Halloween Gift Event!
BodyText: Comeback everyday for a free gift between 10/17 and 10/31. You've received today's gift.

Name: New Build 1.0.6!
BodyText: Today�s special Halloween build kicks off Awakenings and Adventures! Take advantage of these New Features to prepare for upcoming battles!

Name: Ghosts in my Dungeons?!
BodyText: Ghosts are now haunting the Dungeons for a limited time! Challenge them if you dare!

Name: ADVENTURES NOW AVAILABLE!
BodyText: Send your creatures off on ADVENTURES to search for treasure! Come back often to collect loot.

Name: AWAKENINGS NOW AVAILABLE!
BodyText: You may now AWAKEN certain creatures by attaining Spirit Shards! Spirit Shards can be obtained in Adventures or by converting creatures in the Lab.

Name: Marceline 50% off for a limited time!
BodyText: Marceline available in the store for 50% off! Grab this smokin' deal before it disapears, dudes!

Name: BMO leaving the store soon!
BodyText: BMO will become unavailable for purchase after 10/31.  Grab BMO now before it's too late!

Name: Plain Jane is here!
BodyText: Plain Jane has arrived in the Dungeons! Plain Jane has a chance to drop in this super difficult dungeon, but can you meet the challenge?! Good luck, Card Warriors!

Name: Ingredient Dungeon Bosses now added to the Treasure Caves!
BodyText: The following Ingredient Dungeon Boss creatures have been added to the Treasure Caves: The Pickler, Steak Chop, Pieclops, Wall of Chocolate, Sgt. Sandwich, Deputy Hot Dog, Lieutenant Lemonade, Colonel Chicken, Captain Taco, Chest Burster.

Name: HAPPY THANKSGIVING!
BodyText: Here's some gems as a thank you to all you Card Warriors!

Name: 1.0.8 is here!
BodyText: New creatures! New Ranked Multiplayer! New Epic Dungeon! New Awakenings! So cool, homies.

Name: Earl of Lemongrab now available!
BodyText: LIMITED TIME! Earl of Lemongrab Hero available for purchase until 12/15. Not adding him to your roster would be�UNACCEPTABLE!

Name: Nutmeg Season now active!
BodyText: Nutmeg Season  is now active for December! Compete to reach Super Amadeus rank and earn the Algebraic creature Angel of Sand!

Name: Mint Season now active!
BodyText: Mint Season  is now active for December! Compete to reach Super Amadeus rank and earn the Algebraic creature Baldman's Throne!

Name: Chilly Chili Season now active!
BodyText: Chilly Chili Season  is now active for December! Compete to reach Super Amadeus rank and earn the Algebraic creature Corn Ronin!

Name: Toe Salt Season now active!
BodyText: Toe Salt Season  is now active for December! Compete to reach Super Amadeus rank and earn the Algebraic creature Cottonsaurus Rex!

Name: Hotfixes 12/1/2016
BodyText:
The following changes are now live:

- Plain Jane's Passive Ability has been changed to make her more beatable on deploy. Level 1 grants Shield x1 and Max Level is Shield x3.

- Angel of Sand is now an Algebraic Creature.

Additionally, we are aware of the issue with Pirate Bear's Passibe Ability not working when awakened.  This will be fixed in our next client update.
